RLCNL
=====

RAIR Lab's Logically Controlled Natural Language


NLG Example
--------------
The current version provides a way of specifying how logical functors translate into natural language.
The ```define-compositional-nlg``` operator lets one specify how functors can combine compositionally in terms of sub functors. More complex methods of combination will be built later. 

```lisp
    (define-compositional-nlg jack () "jack")

    (define-compositional-nlg mary () "mary")

    (define-compositional-nlg loves (x y) x " loves " y)

    (nlg (parse '(loves jack mary))) ==> 

     "JACK LOVES MARY  "

    (nlg (parse '(perceives jack t1 (loves jack mary)))) ==> 

    "AGENT JACK  PERCEIVES THAT JACK LOVES MARY   AT MOMENT T1  "

```
